mapper.select: SELECT a.ID_ groupId, a.NAME_ groupName, c.ID_ userId FROM ACT_ID_GROUP a, ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP b, ACT_ID_USER c WHERE 1=1 AND a.ID_ = b.GROUP_ID_ AND b.USER_ID_ = c.ID_ AND a.ID_ = #{groupId}
SELECT a.id_ userId FROM ACT_ID_USER a WHERE a.id_ NOT IN (SELECT b.USER_ID_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP b WHERE b.GROUP_ID_ = #{groupId} )
SELECT a.GROUP_ID_, a.USER_ID_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP a WHERE a.GROUP_ID_ = #{groupId} AND a.user_id_ = #{userId}
